alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Breathitt, southeastern Lee and south central Wolfe Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lawson, or near Jackson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Frozen Creek, Fivemile, Elkatawa, Vancleve and Wilhurst around 655 PM EDT. Jackson, Simpson, Keck, Sewell, Inverness, Moct and Curt around 700 PM EDT. Noctor, Quicksand, Dumont, Taulbee, Rock Lick and Haddix around 705 PM EDT. Haginsville, Portsmouth, Wilstacy, Smith Branch, Mountain Valley, Flintville, Lost Creek and Clayhole around 710 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stevenson, Rousseau, Sikes, Press, Guage, Bays and Hardshell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
